docs_error: An error occurs with API while processing query to documentation, please reload the page.
docs_description: This section provides documentation for the Rick and Morty GraphQL API. Due to the fact that it is obtained directly from the API, it is possible to present it only in English.
login_error: Email or password is incorrect. Please, try again or sign up.
full_name_tip: Enter your first and last name with a space
password_tip: Strong password - minimum 8 symbols, at least one letter, one digit, one special character(!@#$%^&*)
confirm_signout: Are you sure you want to sign out?
